> might want to check out apricot... it's a very interesting testing framework
> similar to junit but with more focus on functionality that goes beyond your
> basic unit testing.


If you want stability, don't use Apricot. :-)  We are currently in an 
highly alpha mode since we're evaluating different ways to integrate it 
to Ant (and Avalon, and Commons-loggin...).

If you want to check it out and give your feed-back, you're welcome.

-Vladimir (Apricot's manager)
